website_summaries.verdict: Consider this unit if you're looking for a small, comfortable device that provides top-of-the-line amplification.
pros: Fits well in the ear and delivers good sound at lower volumes
cons: Unit can produce harsh sound and squealing at the highest volumes
If you have true hearing loss, you may need a hearing aid from a specialist

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Wore one in each ear for an hour and they seemed good. The next day they both squealed. Cleaned as shown in instructions and they still squealed (feedback). Sent them back and amazon refunded the money. (Before I bought them had a ENT checkup and saw their audiologist. Was diagnosed with moderate hearing loss. Bit the bullet and went to the audiologist at Sam's Club who did a more through exam. Paid 3.4k (1.7k each). Have worn them for two weeks with good results. ) Recommend that everyone see a Doctor and 2 audiologist's to prevent being ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Leveret

customer_reviews.title: After two months I find these hearing "Amplifiers" working almost ...
customer_reviews.text: After two months I find these hearing "Amplifiers" working almost identically to hearing "aids" that I tested for a week costing thousands more. The only weakness I've noticed is that the ear pieces tend to disintegrate rather quickly; but the unit did come with replacement units. I haven't checked the price for new ones, yet. Also, the $4K units can be controlled from the phone, with ranges in bass and treble....these units don't have that. Follow up; 2 years, and a box of batteries later, I contacted customer service about needing new soft ear pieces; they said they'd send them no cost. Customer service makes me bump this up to a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Robecology

customer_reviews.title: A family saver
customer_reviews.text: Here's an experiment: try to shout and talk intelligibly at the same time, imagine that 25% of your words are stolen out of thin air before they get to your intended audience, then try to have a useful conversation. This was my life trying to hold conversations with my father. While my father did not notice a major difference in crowded settings, the mere fact that I can now talk in a normal voice from another room and that he hears and understands me, and actually engages in conversation and shows an ability to pay attention to what is being said is, quite literally, a life changer. thanks for a a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked inconsistently for about four months. Seemed very sensitive to any metals being close to them. such as rings on my hands. Created a loud buzzinng sound. Also very sensitive to perspiration during hot weather..Seemed hard to balance the sound. No instructions on the difference ways to set the two buttons Now not working at all after putting in new batteries. They were handled carefully with only part-time use. Company sends form letter after request for refund which is only 20% of purchase price. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the expensive hearing aid I replaced
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with these. I was able to adjust the sound range snd volume to a combination that works well for me. My left ear hearing aid had given up the ghost and was out of warranty. Since two sets of expensive hearing aids had helped with volume but not clarity over the years, I decided to look elsewhere. I honestly can’t tell the difference in quality of what I’m able to understand between this snd the other two expensive sets. My hearing is quite bad so no aid is going to improve my comprehension more than up to a certain level. The volume control gives a good range of choices. Not too loud. Not too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $10.95 for new batteries
customer_reviews.text: Amplifier worked for about 5 seconds then went off never to come back on. Went an bought new batteries (waste of money) still would not work. Would have given it zero stars if possible. I am sending item back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: I've had my hearing gradually deteriorate over the years and talked to a number of friends who had spent thousands on hearing aids and told me they didn't get much improvement for the money. So, I figured I'd try LifeEar and if it worked, maybe think about a high priced hearing aid. After trying it, I find I don't need any more hearing help and can hear things I never heard 50 years ago, so I'm staying with LifeEar.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bickers

customer_reviews.title: While they do provide her with better hearing she is reluctant to wear them when outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife. While they do provide her with better hearing she is reluctant to wear them when outside for any length of time. The reason is that she is afraid that they will blow off her ear. In fact one almost blew off one day. I believe that she would be more comfortable with them if she felt that they fit snugly and held fast to her ears. Inside she wears them most days and hears well. She is not adventuresome with electronic devices and thus has not explored the capabilities of all the programs.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: A 'New' Experience.
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely hearing more with these 'babies', and so far, it seems like I am understanding human speech 'somewhat' better. With the 'extra' sound being processed, I'm not sure about an increase in recognizing consonants (F's, Th's, S's etc) in human speech, which is what I seem to be having trouble with. I'm still adjusting to them, learning more about what they are doing and not doing and ... am enjoying playing with them and hearing 'more'.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Powers

customer_reviews.title: and this had great reviews. MIL put them in and she could ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mother-in-law. We researched these hearing aids, and this had great reviews. MIL put them in and she could hear better with these, than she previously heard with her thousands of dollars set. She was very happy. We are happy to see her hearing again without spending the money she does not have on hearing aids. A great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lady

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long ?
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying or trying a hearing amplifier and I was not disappointed , why did I wait so long? My doctor told me not to get a cheap one but get good one 1000to 1500 dollars she said which I really could not ever afford but, 350 $ was not cheap for me , but I'm glad I bought it , the batteries need to be changed each week but, are affordable and there is some squeaky feedback sometimes but I can hear everything now and it's so small people don't even know I'm wearing one unless I tell them,
customer_reviews.author: Earthchild60

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LifeEar BOOST for two reasons: 1) I lost one of my $2,000 each hearing aids, and 2) Amazon customer reviews. Now I wear the LifeEar in one ear and a hearing aid in the other and cannot tell the difference in quality of sound. There are some minor structural differences. When the battery compartment is open on the LifeEar the battery will fall out, this does not happen with the hearing aid. I wish the LifeEar had a low battery warning like the hearing aid. If I loose my other hearing aid I will replace it with a LifeEar.
customer_reviews.author: Range Doc

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery consumption is too high, It lasts about 2 or 3 days. I feel like returning this immediately but this was already sent to for my father who lives abroad. I regret this purchase. Also, didn't know that Tip and Tubing are consumables and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AshJan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Service from the company was excellent, but the product did not work for me because it was not strong enough. I sent it back with good service from the company.
customer_reviews.author: ami90274

customer_reviews.title: These really are good hearing aids
customer_reviews.text: Great for any person who needs a hearing boost. Batteries last longer than I thought they would. My mom uses these every day and they HELP ALOT. The are small but she can still put them on herself. She really likes them. THANK YOU !!!!!! They also do not squeal whenever she gets a hug like her last pair did. These are much cheaper than her over expensive custom fit brand and frankly... they work better. My mom know talks on the phone again and can hear us !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blackmoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to age-related conductive hearing loss.
customer_reviews.text: After doing research on various PSAP devices, this product was recommended. I heartily agree. The difference in my hearing is astonishing! I have already recommended it to family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product works better than the more expensive alternatives that he bought years ...
customer_reviews.text: According to my dad, this product works better than the more expensive alternatives that he bought years ago (and abandoned because it's not comfortable and it has since broken down). I am glad that it provides superior quality. He said that since it doesn't close his ear completely it doesn't induce ringing sound after a while. Another thing to note was that, LifeEar was gracious enough to extend our 30 days trial into 60 days because we could only test it after the 30th day from purchase. This customer service alone is worthy of the 5-star review. Thanks LifeEar!
customer_reviews.author: Selamat

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 100 year old mother. Her hearing aids are ancient and she won't buy new ones because of the $5000+ price tags. A friend recommended this. It came yesterday and I decided to try it on myself before giving it to my mom. Who knew there were so many small noises in this world?!! I tried it with the TV and was able to lower the volume from 40 to 19. I am surprised that my neighbors haven't complained. I am definitely ordering one for me. I am looking forward to using it at the theater where I have struggled with understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMPANY AND BEST PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product works great..and Boost fits all ear sizes..just change dome. Company is the BEST they help u with any problem you have. I am dyslexic so I had problem understanding how to lower volume...company wrote and explain it to me in way I could understand and problem solved. I needed smaller dome...company sent me array of different domes for small ear..no company I ever used for anything in my life (and I am over 80) ever cared and helped so much..incredible product and company So happy I now can hear
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I went from everything sounding muddled to ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 2 (left and right) LifeEars. I love them! I went from everything sounding muddled to all sounds being sharp and crystal clear. The amplification is son good, I needed to turn them down a tad. I had tried the cheap ones a couple of times and was disappointed. The amplification was there and so was distracting screeching. None of that with LifeEar. So I would definitely not hesitate to recommend this product, especially at this price. Plus LifeEar is excellent at doing email follow-up to make sure I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: lebarn

customer_reviews.title: works best of all
customer_reviews.text: I've used hearing aids for many years----all expensive models through local audio dealers. My hearing problem is understanding normal conversation-. I require high frequency compensation. This Hearing Amplifier with it's several selections of correction. works best of all. When inserting the LifEar -- Practise in front of a two view folding mirror, and be certain that it is deep in the ear canal--- I actually use a pencil with a rubber eraser tip as a pusher' Howard Anderson
customer_reviews.author: Howard R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT AND WARRANTY IS GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both right and left ear devices. After about 60 days, or so, the right ear unit would go into "settings" mode with out using the switches. It would just keep going through the settings over and over until I disconnected the battery. After notifying LifeEar and they determined there was definitely a problem, they replaced it with no fanfare. All I had to do was send the faulty device back after receiving the replacement. Other than that, I love the way these devices perform, and I'm very pleased with the way LifeEar honored the warranty. I can highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solution for Mild Hearing Issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product! With about 20% hearing loss, LifeEar helped me by reducing background noise in a computer classroom to better hear student questions. Worked well there, and also for improving higher pitched ranges from my young grand daughter. An exceptional solution when hearing loss is not significant, but becoming a problem in specific situations. Much better than being forced into high priced solutions that are not yet needed. Great solution from this small American company@
customer_reviews.author: NW_Prof

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hearing amplifiers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he is extremely happy with the pair. He has been a little reluctant to get hearing aids but has been very pleased with the set and is wearing them all the time. They do not echo and they are so lightweight and comfortable that he forgets he has them on. The audiologist had quoted him a price of approximately $5000.00 and we bought these for about $700.00. I'm so glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Small and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: does not come even close to modern digital hearing aids. Loud with a lot of background noise. Small and comfortable to wear, but going back to prescription hearing aid.
customer_reviews.author: Max Grishkevich

customer_reviews.title: I can hear!
customer_reviews.text: I have lived at my current home for over thirty-five years and until this week I have never heard the birds chirp or the wind rustling through the leaves on the trees. Never could I clearly hear my grands or any of my loved ones. LiveEar has made a great difference. I hear clearly. Thanks. . . . . David
customer_reviews.author: Barnacle Riley

customer_reviews.title: How to get a replacement  for the non working aid.
customer_reviews.text: One of the Empower hearing boosters does not work. The other works fine. Mary is waiting to hear what to do with the non-working one. Please let us know soon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mannes

customer_reviews.title: Love mine!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful experience. Easy to use. Great tone quality. Only tried one for one ear, but will order second one soon. No more blaring TV, shouting on the phone, missing conversations, closed captions. Am planning to order one for the other ear very soon. I have already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little device!
customer_reviews.text: This little device has changed my life! It has helped my tinnitus and I now hear everything better. I purchased Life Ear after doing a lot of research for a product that would help my tinnitus and the hearing loss from it. I ordered Life Ear knowing I could try it, and if it didn't help I could return within 30 days. I was missing so much and didn't realize it until I received my LifeEar. This is so small and very comfortable to wear, my only complaint is that the information provided about volume adjustment is not good at all. I emailed the company and they returned detailed instructions within 24 hours. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well to improve understanding my granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one LifeEar Boost to try as a replacement for a failed hearing aid and found that worked very well to enhance my high frequency deficits. I bought a second one for my other ear to replace my old hearing aid. Now I can better understand my young granddaughters and conversations in noisy rooms.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the quality of sound and life of batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the kind you put in your ear before. They had metalic sound and batteries ran down fast. These are pricey but worth it, i also bought the one designed for the other ear. Worth it to me. Hear clear and no more ringing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Thank you again for the excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: My mother can finally hear !! She has been in denial for 5 years and I just went ahead and purchased your product. No more 96 decibel conversations. She finally can stop the shouting matches and hear what I say in a normal voice. She's 92 years old. Thank you again for the excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time using the amplifier. First of all it didn't work with my glasses (their description said that it would). I ended up returning the device - which in itself was complicated. After about 3 weeks and a couple of phone calls I did receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service mediocre product
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the customer service. The device didn't look like the picture the switch looked like it was one piece and looked of quality. It looks like a cheaper version. It was working well the first time I used it and whistled when it was obstructed. Now it just seems weak and doesn't even whistle when you put your hand over it. It is still somewhat helpful to wear but not like the first day. I have cleaned the tubing the way the instructions read but it still didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Diana8

customer_reviews.title: Arrived incomplete missing one of the ear buds. After ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived incomplete missing one of the ear buds. After one weeks usage the volume levels and tone controls have quit working. It's a shame because with a few tweaks it could be a first rate hearing device.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W.

customer_reviews.title: and ordered the recommended replacement parts as well
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Life Ear for a year, and ordered the recommended replacement parts as well. I am delighted with the quality and clarity of this amplifier. I certainly thought it was worth a try before plunking down thousands of dollars on hearing aids! Everyone connected with the product have been very knowledgeable and helpful. I will not pay for expenseive hearing aids when this supplies all the amplification I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: bought both ears- see other review.
customer_reviews.text: these were purchased for my dad because he lost one of his custom ones and the other seemed to be giving him trouble. not sure if we were doing something wrong, although my mom and i both followed the directions very carefully. for some reason the volume up and down didn't seem to work (didn't hear a beep) although my dad said he could hear us better?! this is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: okie dokie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and would recommend it to anyone that needs everything amplified, and they have volume controls to adjust for your needs, why pay an outrageous price when you can have these that do as much or more that the very expensive ones do.
customer_reviews.author: SOFOMTN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hearing aid I have recently ordered. The one I ordered two weeks ago I absolutely love. The sound is clear and crisp. It doesn't have the closed in feeling I had with my in ear aids. This one is for my 88 year old mother. She can't wait to try it as well. She is tired of fiddling with the wheel volume control on her in ear aids. This device has a button you click and can hear the volume adjust with a buzz. I wish I had this hearing aid years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Finally - A great hearing aid that allows consumers to take charge of their hearing.
customer_reviews.text: This is just awesome! Replaces a unit that cost over $2,500... and my mom said it works better and she can maintain it herself. Plus the settings and volume are adjustable. Customer service is fantastic too. Make sure you select left or right on the drop down menu for "size". No more quarterly visits to the hearing center. No more feeling helpless. At less than 20% of the cost, it's a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Fifty storms

customer_reviews.title: Great product--I just needed something to amplify in situations that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product--I just needed something to amplify in situations that most folks describe as difficult--background noise, TV, social settings. I am much more relaxed now that I know I am not missing important information.
customer_reviews.author: COBEE

customer_reviews.title: and Iwas hearing so much better that by mistake I decided to (" upgrade ") ...
customer_reviews.text: I never participate in reviews. But I did buy LifeEar aids months ago, and Iwas hearing so much better that by mistake I decided to (" upgrade ") to more expensive aids. After buying and trying four different brands, I am convinced there are none better
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mom and she loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it!! It works really well for her and she can't believe everything she has missed not having a hearing aid earlier. You can't see it in her ear which was important to her and now she can have normal conversations with people without us yelling at her and she can hear her tv without turning it up full blast! She has only had it several weeks but noting from the other reviews this aid should work well for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph & Tracey Berger-Davis

customer_reviews.title: For moderately hearing-impaired
customer_reviews.text: Know that they are specific to your ears, right and left. I have a left one and accidentally bought a second left one for my right ear. Returned it for that reason alone. Good for tv and quiet talkers.
customer_reviews.author: Me.

customer_reviews.title: Take care before you spend huge amounts on hearing aids.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really helpful device. Before figuring out if I really need hearing aids, this has helped me in the transition from infection and loss to healing and assessing the real need for hearing assistance . A huge financial savings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but it it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn hearing aids for a decade. This was a long shot, but when my husband lost his hearing aid, the replacement was $2000-3000. He is very active, so another loss was a distinct possibility. We decided there was no risk to look into a more affordable alternative. It’s crazy, but he says this is far better than the expensive ones. It is more comfortable, secure, and stays put in his ear. Conversation in restaurants is much clearer, and no feedback. The volume and program adjustments are easy. Wow, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: LifeEar Amplier
customer_reviews.text: The ear pieces don't fit well and need to be replaced. I told them when I purchased these that I have a very small ear canal and they just sent a normal pair. There is too much feedback as a result.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Graff

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this product a very bad review. I received the product and could not hear the beeps that were supposed to occur when the rocker switch on the side of the item was adjusted. Turns out that the device has to be inserted into the ear before making the adjustment. When someone explained this to me the product works as advertised. It really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Baudino

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect hearing "aid" for someone who is not yet ready to buy a hearing aid. I ended up buying two of them -- they're comfortable, have four volume levels (as well as four background noise adjustment levels), can be completely turned down when necessary, and the batteries last a week or more. The price was reasonable and their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: *AmazonShopper*

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: After a hearing check with an ENT specialist and an audiologist, i deferred purchasing the recommended device at @8k dollars to try the LifeEae boost. It fits my needs perfectly. I no longer strain to hear conversation or the tv. I will probably purchase one for the other ear at some point but right now, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S. Jamison

customer_reviews.title: A life changer
customer_reviews.text: Never realized how bad my hearing was until I put these on. I decided to buy these after reading the good reviews and I'm glad I did. I can hear perfectly fine now. Everything is loud and clear. I don't need to ask people to repeat themselves. It's a whole different world now. These are also very small. I have bad hearing on both of my ears but I only bought the right ear hearing aid and it feels fine that way.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Works as an amplifier of sound. I have not been able to get it to change to the different settings other than volume. I have called customer service twice and of no real help. Unit came before the estimated delivery date. All I had to do was insert a battery. Unit came ready to use. Have been using it for only a month.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine A Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: I first tried the $1999 variety from Costco and they were very satisfactory however I didn't feel that I had the need for 2 earpieces when only my left ear was the culprit. I also tried the $29 variety amplifier and you might as well throw your money away . The Lifeear is excellent . It picks up what you want to hear with no background noise. I also discovered the Power ear piece is the better for me than the regular unit that comes with the LifeEar. Much better amplification. I would buy LifeEar again if I needed help with my hearing.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M GROOMS

customer_reviews.title: I have tested 3 popular, expensive, hearing aids ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tested 3 popular, expensive, hearing aids over the last four years. They were all returned after the trial period, because they were no more effective than a simple amplifier I had used for several years. This aid is significantly more beneficial than either of the expensive aids.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES A. HOLLINGSWORTH

customer_reviews.title: LifeEar sound is very distorted in all settings. Voices ...
customer_reviews.text: LifeEar sound is very distorted in all settings. Voices are nearly impossible to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cutler

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd aids I have had. These are not that well made. OK for the price, I guess. The batteries don't fit snug so they fall out of the holder when you don't want them to. My glasses hit the adjustment buttons. I work hard and when I prespire, it messes with the aids and I have to dry them out. I will be seeking a refund and try a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Tried cheaper amplifiers and glad I went back to this one for the 2nd ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried cheaper amplifiers and glad I went back to this one for the 2nd time. Mother-in-law had lost the previous one and we thought we would go with a cheaper unit for her and although it had good reviews, it was nowhere near the quality and ease of use as this one. This amplifier is easy to use and most important is that my mother-in-law loves it. Don't be fooled by cheaper cost advertisements. Sound quality on this amplifier is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Smith

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair for a few weeks. I bought them after losing one of my $5500 Oticon hearing aids, which I had bought some time ago and which were never great. So far so good. Except for what appears to be relatively short battery life, they are as advertised: easy to use, increases conversational volume--and I think but am not yet certain that they will work as well or better where ambient noise is a problem, such as the damnable, acoustically challenged NY restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Joan fabricant

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work well...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say about these except they worked and customer service was great. My mom on the other hand did not like them because she is overwhelmed with anyhting that requires her to move or do something! I had to send them back because I'm not with her to put them in and take them out everytime she needs it.
customer_reviews.author: lzbn69

customer_reviews.title: i bought one of these in july 2015. in ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought one of these in july 2015. in the first month i had to exchange it for another as it whistled continuously. it's february 28, 2016 and it's dead. while it did work it was a real improvement. but $379 for 6 months is a bit steep. so LifeEar contacted me, in a reply to this comment. they suggested i buy a new tubing. i bought the new tubing, from them, and it just arrived. i put it together with the LifeEar hearing aid and nothing. i tried a new battery, nothing. i tried a new battery from a new container of batteries, nothing. whatever, a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful. The only problem I have is sometimes the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. The only problem I have is sometimes the little tiny wire connecting to the ear piece keeps slipping out . You have to take time to practice different settings for your own hearing needs. That is easy just a couple little buttons to adjust while you wear it. I would recommend this. I may be getting another one before to long for my other ear. Be sure you tell them which ear you want it for.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Be careful about ringing noise when using this product.
customer_reviews.text: the one downside to this product in ringing in the ear. the company claims this can happen if the fit in the ear is not correct. unfortunately, I have been unable to stop the ringing for long term use. sometimes it is constant, sometimes it is not. this is something to consider when ordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Works OK At Great Price
customer_reviews.text: It just increases the sound so it has limited value for picking up conversations. At the price it fits very well and works so if you don't want to pay $2000 this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Corsair

customer_reviews.title: Big savings for same quality at many times the cost
customer_reviews.text: I spent $2000 on a hearing aid that I used for 4 weeks after reading that nanotechnology has made the same quality much cheaper, and it was true. I am very satisfied with this device. Service is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Culturally curious

customer_reviews.title: His hearing has been getting bad for several years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this device for my 84 year old father. He loves it. His hearing has been getting bad for several years. We tried another product for about a year with very mixed results. The LifeEar Hearing Amplifier has made a world of difference for him. He hears clearly conversations on the phone now and in person. He has even turned down the TV volume because the device works so well for him. I don't generally write a review for anything, but this was the exception to that rule. Very pleased with the product so far and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ones would be that much better. Thank you Life Ear
customer_reviews.text: My hearing loss is mild to moderate so this device helps me. Also, the price is right. It's hard to conceive the $2500. ones would be that much better. Thank you Life Ear!
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: My husband is finally able to hear and the tv is no longer on the highest volume (59) Very happy great product
customer_reviews.text: We looked into hearing aids and even ordered some from Costco for $2,600. When we got home My husband went on line and found this hearing amplifier after reading all the reviews we decided to order this one and cancelled the Costco one's. My husband is finally able to hear and the tv is no longer on the highest volume (59) Very happy great product
customer_reviews.author: DONNA B

customer_reviews.title: ... of hearing amplifiers on Amazon and this was the best. It's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried several brands of hearing amplifiers on Amazon and this was the best. It's very comfortable, fits my ear canal well. Unlike the others, this one does not have problems with feedback or with annoying hiss.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Performance
customer_reviews.text: Great value and performance. I purchased $4500 hearing aids 10 years ago. They died over time. I waited until I found the Empower aids for a sixth of the price. The technology today exceeds what I had. This is a second purchase of Empower aids. I had one for my right ear, but my grandson dropped it in a glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Hearing things he has missed... like the rainfall
customer_reviews.text: My husband has only had it a couple of days but the difference is amazing!!!! He has been so happy and amazed at the things he can now hear. The only thing I wish is that it had rechargeable batteries!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zinkand

customer_reviews.title: When all potential issues were eliminated they quickly sent me another one and it is so great to hear people in meetings again
customer_reviews.text: The first LifeEar I received stopped working after a few days. The LifeEar staff were very helpful and tried to troubleshoot the problem. When all potential issues were eliminated they quickly sent me another one and it is so great to hear people in meetings again. ... Well, maybe there is a downside to this! :) Seriously, the amplification of ALL sounds takes a bit of adjusting to, but to hear background and foreground sounds vs hearing nothing -- this is the option to take. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: ... out and I found it to be a very good hearing aid
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to try it out and I found it to be a very good hearing aid. I particularly liked that when you turn it off at night the next day when you turn it on it remembers your settings so you don't have to fiddle with it to get your settings back. Also, The batteries last an amazing length of time. All in all this is the best hearing aid I have tried. I now own two one for each ear. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: What a great piece of technology. Price and quality....... what more could we ask for?
customer_reviews.text: This little device makes a big difference in my sweethearts life. She is 72 and was finding herself cupping her ear to hear the television. Asking people to repeat themselves. I just went ahead and ordered it and let her be the judge. She loves it and just wears it when needed. Her granddaughter was visiting last week ........ she is very soft spoken ...... it was time to pop in the amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B. Doebke

customer_reviews.title: ... this due to reviews and am shocked it's working better than the hearing aids I paid thousands of dollars ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to reviews and am shocked it's working better than the hearing aids I paid thousands of dollars for. I'm planning on buying the one for the left there as well. I just have a question if I move my hand near my ear there is a buzzing sound is that supposed to happen. Also I have to adjust for talking on the phone or watching TV. But other than having my normal hearing back this is the next best thin so far
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Volume, noise cancellation and sound quality were fine for 5 weeks. Then it just stopped working. I tried several new batteries just to make sure it was not a battery issue. Purchased lots of batteries, what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Lansing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works much better that expected, bought one for the right ear too after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Design
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I previously bought one to try it out in my left ear - now have two for right and left ear. This latest one is even better than the first one I bought since it has a volume control on it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shehane

customer_reviews.title: Over the top hearing aid
customer_reviews.text: This hearing aid is "over the top". I bought two similar-looking and functioning hearing aids from Costco for around $1800. I bought one LifeEar (for 1/3 the cost of one Costco aid) as a backup for traveling. The LifeEar is so good that when my old aids stop working they'll be replaced by the new LifeEar. It is a super hearing aid for a really great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: So Blessed!

customer_reviews.title: LifeEar provides excellent customer service that has resolve my minor problems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 83 and LifeEar worked for me. I had a pair of hearing aids ($2000 each) that did not work as will as LifeEar. LifeEar provides excellent customer service that has resolve my minor problems to my complete satisfaction. I will replace my three year old LifeEars if and when they stop working with LifeEar.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Amplifier is comfortable, works very well
customer_reviews.text: Amplifier is comfortable, works very well, and you certainly can't beat the price when compared to hearing aids. So glad we found these.
customer_reviews.author: Godog

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to and a lot of fiddling ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to and a lot of fiddling with the settings to make it usable. Batteries don't last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Will I continue to receive guidance if needed
customer_reviews.text: I am still adjusting to the use of these new hearing amplifiers. It is a little difficult to access at this time since I had previously had very expensive hearing aids for which I received regular checkups, etc. Considering the price and the ease with which to use the Empower aids, I, at this early stage consider them a very good replacement. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jane R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I bought this for my 85 year old father who had never used a hearing aid before. He loved it from the second i helped him use it. His eyes lit up ad he smiled listening to all the sounds that he was now able to hear. The battery changing could be cumbersome for elderly clients. i wish it had an on/off switch for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ara Boyadjian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a problem with feedback but when I changed the placement of the earbud in my ear canal and found the right orientation for it, it is perfect. After using the multi-thousand dollar hearing aids for years I thought I'd try this. It is wonderful, costs far, far less than the others and is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Completely helped my mom.
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I purchased one of these for my mom and she loved it. So I purchased a second one so she could have a pair. She was _super_ reluctant to try a hearing aid but she is really happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted with the hearing amplifier
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the hearing amplifier. It amplifies sound well and even enables me to hear some high frequency sounds that I can't hear without the device. I like the simple took for cleaning the tube as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. TIlson

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself thousands and give this little device a try!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Business Assistant - she absolutely loves the size, and different options available to enhance her hearing. As she mentioned to me yesterday, it has significantly improved her quality of life. Of course, it's improved my quality of life as well, making it easier to communicate with her. Looks like I'll be buying another one for her. Great price for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: PDM

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be the same as the $6000 ones I tried at the audiologists .They have all the same features and the sound quality is the same to my ears anyway. At $750 a pair, they are a real bargain. I've had these for 1 Month today and so far, so good. Battery life seems to be about 1 week which is'nt bad considering how tiny they are and on-line replacements are quite cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ayeray

customer_reviews.title: Works just as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother and now we can converse with her in a normal tone of voice and watch TV with her at a normal volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: I can hear you now
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to countering my partial hearing loss. I am happy to have discovered this product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 97 year Aunt threw away her $2,000 hearing aid by mistake. I bought this one and you got to fine-tune it because it does squeal back but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Bubgrimm

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with LifeEar
customer_reviews.text: The process of adjusting to these devices is no more complicated than adjusting to regular hearing aids first time. I am unable to use regular hearing aids that inserted into my ear because the shape of my canal, so I am familiar with the process of using a device to amplify my hearing. I am very pleased with LifeEar. I also was very pleasantly surprised with the customer service person John (who may or not exist), who walked me through a few minor issues via emails. I received valuable information to help me with the transition and maintenance. I can honestly I am happy with the money I saved and very happy with the devices and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Fort Collins' Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 95 yrs young mom. She does not want to deal with the specialists. So we gave this a try I was concerned that she would not be able to operate the settings, but she caught on. She uses just one and is able to attend her card games and have normal conversation. I was skeptical but it does the job without picking up too much background noise.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hauge

customer_reviews.title: 10 Months and still satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant beat them. I bought $3000 pairs in the past. The Life Ears way out perform them. 10 Months and still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Hearing amplifiet
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent for the purpose that i purchased it for which is to use indoor when watching tv. The quality looks everybit as good as my $2200 hearing aid that i purchased several years ago. The earpiece component is much more comfortabe to wear than my hearing aid. I believe that it is an exceptional value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pierre

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Needed batteries replaced weekly. Product totally failed after 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is doing well so far and is very affordable.  --update:  audio is ok, but wasn't a comfortable fit in my ear.
customer_reviews.text: The lifeear hearing aid I got works well in magnifying sound. I am not so sure it is great at screening out background noise but the more expensive hearing aids I have used are not great either. One small improvement I would recommend is making the battery compartment more snug so the battery does not so easily fall out when opened. I hope the device does not need frequent, expensive repairs like the other brand I have been using. I would give this lifeear device at least a 4 star rating now but later I may give it a 5 star rating if it lasts well.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I can hear the spoken word better than with my previous analog hearing aid. Also it is quite a bit smaller and more invisible to the eye. I am perfectly satisfied with this hearing amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: henry w.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing alternative to hearing aide
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom who has partial hearing loss in one ear. She wouldn't wear a hearing aide, but she loves this. She wears her hair in an updo often, and the amplifier is not visible. So thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely pleased with their service
customer_reviews.text: When mom lost her LifeEar hearing device after 5 days of receiving it, LifeEar sent a replacement - free of charge - and within 3 business days! I was extremely pleased with their service, price, and concern for mom's loss. She was not charged anything for the replacement and she can now hear without spending thousands of dollars. I would highly recommend doing business with LifeEar.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany K.

product_meta.title: Empower Hearing Amplifier. Digital Noise Reduction, Feedback Cancellation Enhances Speech. 4 Program Nearly Invisible Behind The Ear 12 Channel Device Aids Hearing. Ready to Wear, 1 Yr Warranty
product_meta.description: Color:Beige| Style:Pair - Both EarsTURN DOWN THE TV – NOW YOU CAN HEAR! Family members and friends will be amazed when you can hear conversations, music, nature, and much more with wonderful clarity. We know how frustrating missing words and not understanding everything that is being said can be. It's embarrassing when you can’t fully participate. Now you can put all that trouble behind you with clear, precise, detailed digital sound. Suddenly all the conversation, voices, and sounds around you are clear and easy to understand. Simultaneously suppresses background noises that interfere with what you want to hear. DIGITAL AMPLIFICATION AND 12-BAND PROCESSING. This is the advanced high tech way to boost audibility of conversations. A single band would amplify all frequencies with the same amount leading to background noise blocking out voices. You just need an amplifier that only boosts what you want to hear, your family and friends. TINY, DISAPPEARS BEHIND EAR where hardly anyone will ever notice you're wearing this powerful hearing amplifier. Thin as a pencil. Uses modern mini technology to very compactly and discreetly give you the powerful sound boost needed to clearly hear sounds and speech around you. 8 BATTERIES INCLUDED so you can start using your Empower BOOST Hearing Amplifier the moment you receive it and well into the future. Also includes needed tubing and two sizes of the revolutionary new Comfort Tip. 12 MONTH WARRANTY GUARANTEE ensures this is your best bet for a no-risk purchase. You can depend on this very high quality device to deliver the improved hearing you've been wanting for years. HURRY AND BUY NOW while we have a plentiful supply in stock. This makes a much appreciated gift to a loved one. Great for birthdays, anniversaries, Christmas, holidays, and more.
feature_bullets: REJOIN THE CONVERSATION with Doctor and Audiologist designed hearing solution at far lower cost than expensive prescription hearing devices. Crystal clear digital amplification brings out conversation so you easily understand everything being said and enjoy life again. Hear sounds of nature, quiet sounds.

SAVE THOUSANDS OVER OTHER HEARING OPTIONS. No need to pay $5,000 or more just to hear better. Our Empower BOOST Hearing Amplifier uses an advanced 12-band processing that precisely boosts the frequencies associated with the human voice. Control programs and volume with a single switch. With four different programs, you can personalize to suit your environment.

THIN AS A PENCIL, ALMOST INVISIBLE BEHIND EAR. No one will know you're wearing our high-tech hearing amplification device. Fits discreetly and compactly behind your ear. Comfortable and very effective. Available in Beige, Graphite, and Grey.

8 BATTERIES INCLUDED along with tubing and two sizes of the revolutionary new Comfort Tip. Get a perfect, comfortable fit for the best hearing experience. Enjoy clearer conversations immediately Comfor

12 MONTH WARRANTY GUARANTEE ensures this will soon be your favorite no-risk purchase. This small, compact device is very durably made with superior materials and outstanding reliability. HURRY AND BUY NOW while we have both ears and all colors in stock. This makes a wonderful gift for any friend, family member, or co-worker. You will make their day with perfect enhanced hearing.
